# **Tender Announcement:** 
## **Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) for Safety and Environmental Verification Services**

### Contract Title:

*   **English**: Safety and Environmental Verification Services, Halifax, NS, and Esquimalt, BC
*   **French**: Services de Vérification de la Sécurité et de l'Environnement, Halifax et Esquimalt

### Tender Details:

*   **Solicitation Number:** [HX220017](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2312011172/abstract?language=EN)
*   **Reference Number:** [MX-22586982931](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2312011172/abstract?language=EN)
*   **Tender Closing Date:** [2022-11-15T14:00:00](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2312011172/abstract?language=EN)
*   **Publication Date:** [2022-10-04](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2312011172/abstract?language=EN)

### Services Required:

The Canadian Department of National Defence (DND), in collaboration with Defence Construction Canada (DCC), is soliciting proposals from qualified consulting firms to provide safety and environmental verification services for Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax and Esquimalt.

A Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) with a maximum value of $2,000,000 will be awarded for a period of one (1) year with optional four (4) one-year extensions. Call-ups under the SOA are expected to be valued between $ 8,000.00 and $ 20,000.00, with a maximum value of $75,000.00.

The DPA documents contain more information on the services and contract details.

### Proposal Requirements:

Proposers are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.

### Selection Criteria:

Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the RFAP, including:

*   Up-to-date and relevant verification expertise
*   Regional knowledge and local familiarity
*   Close networks of suppliers and partners
*   Communications, and Administration
